org.redpin.android.net.home
Class RemoteEntityHome

java.lang.Object
  org.redpin.android.net.home.RemoteEntityHome
All Implemented Interfaces:
PerformRequestTaskCallback
public class RemoteEntityHome
extends java.lang.Object
implements PerformRequestTaskCallback

RemoteEntityHome handles request to server and calls the responsible Entity RemoteEntityHomes to synchronize the local database after the request was performed

Author:
Pascal Brogle (broglep@student.ethz.ch)
